H0.text: Who was Inspector Clouseau's manservant. Jenkins

H1.text: Who was Inspector Clouseau's manservant. Felix

H2.text: Who was Inspector Clouseau's manservant. Reginald

H3.text: Who was Inspector Clouseau's manservant. Kato

A4.text: Clouseau's long-suffering Chinese manservant is Cato (Burt Kwouk), who attacks him to improve his martial arts skills.
